context.text: List of people from Savannah, Georgia - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Official U.S. House of Representatives photo of Representative Jack Kingston .
List of people from Savannah, Georgia
Library of Congress photo of First Lady Ellen Axson Wilson .
Screenshot image of author Bruce Feiler .
Official NASA photo of Col L. Blaine Hammond .

[ edit ] Notes A. ^ Notability for inclusion in this listing is based upon the standards outlined in Wikipedia:Notability . B. ^ Savannah had 24 original squares. Today 21 are still in existence. C. ^ The 2006 Producers Guild Award nomination (Motion Picture Producer of the Year Award) was shared with Cathy Konrad. [4] D. ^ Tied with Michael Caine ("Jack the Ripper") for the 1989 Golden Globe Award for Best Performance by an Actor in a Mini-Series or Motion Picture Made for TV.
Official photo of Savannah Mayor Otis Johnson .
Official U.S. Congress photo of Bob Inglis , member of the United States House of Representatives.
